remarks: Existential specialization with 3 quantifiers, using implicit substitution.  (Contributed by NM, 12-May-2008.)
statement:
spc3egv.1 $e |- ( ( x = A /\ y = B /\ z = C ) -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
spc3egv $p |- ( ( A e. V /\ B e. W /\ C e. X ) -> ( ps -> E. x E. y E. z ph ) ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d B x y z $.
$d C x y z $.
$d ps x y z $.
